*HEADS UP*

I recently found out that for some reason, inventory/save game editors only work on the stock/pre-made chars :(

The color issues are related to some general coding issues involving directX. Download killap's patch killap.net and install and then follow the directions. psychedelic display issues should go away after that.
*note* you may have to manually edit the ddraw.ini file. under the graphics section, change the setting to run under dx 9. I believe it's setting 4. check the readme for details.
compatibility mode does jack shit. I haven't used this specific copy yet, but vista/7's compatibility mode hasn't actually solved a single issue I've ever dealt with involving legacy apps.
